channel.title: Comments on: So many things went missing that day
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: I thought you told me he died in his 30s from diabetes.
item.content:encoded: I thought you told me he died in his 30s from diabetes.

item.title: By: Mom
item.dc:creator: Mom
item.description: March 26, 1962 My Dad went missing. His life ended on the last day of his forty-eighth year. Where is the poster for him?
item.content:encoded:
March 26, 1962 My Dad went missing.
His life ended on the last day of his forty-eighth year.
Where is the poster for him?
